segments.text: I'm really quite frustrated by the woman's complete lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so absorbed in drying a single plate?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing massively, yet she just stands there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, her children are engaged in risky behavior right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool could tip at any second, and she wouldn't even know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find her obliviousness truly infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be more aware of her surroundings, especially with kids present.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The damage from the water is going to be significant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just shaking my head at this whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR
